page.title: 16RECREATION CRESSBROOK MILL
page.content: {SQUASH AT CRESSBROOK MILL One of the buildings at the mill has been cleverly converted to 2 squash courts with spectator gallery,changing rooms and showers,a small licensed bar and lounge area,a large room with Disco equipment and lights,and a further room with a small Pool Table. There are 150 playing members drawn mainly from the surrounding areas.Courts are bookable and coaching is available from a professional. Within the club there are leagues and ladders and inter-club competitions are organised.Various social events are arranged,most activities take place in the evenings and at week-ends. Immediate future plans include a small gymnasium and indoor bowls on the floor above.
